channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trending tickers: Nvidia, Tesla, Roche, Novo Nordisk and Fresnillo
Mass. couple wins $360K without lawyers but say flawed laws left no choice
I’m 35 and sank $95K into the S&P 500 — then lost $15K. How long must I wait for the market to recover?
Former Thai prosecutors sentenced to prison for alleged cover-up of Red Bull heir’s deadly crash
What are the biggest employers in the Shelby County suburbs? Check out the breakdown here
Some GOP states are targeting driver’s licenses issued to immigrants illegally in the US
NASA images show peanut-shaped asteroid during high-speed flyby
item.description: This asteroid is bigger than scientists anticipated, about 5 miles long and 2 miles wide at its widest point — resembling a deformed peanut.

item.title: 4/21: The Daily Report
item.description: Lindsey Reiser reports on the death of Pope Francis and international reaction, another Signal chat raising concerns about access to sensitive governm...

item.title: 4/21: CBS Evening News
item.description: Remembering Pope Francis, the Catholic Church leader who broke with tradition; Pope Francis defied doctors to serve until the very end, aide says

item.title: Anti-Defamation League says anger at Israel is now the driving force behind antisemitism in the US
item.description: The Anti-Defamation League says the number of antisemitic incidents in the United States reached a record high last year.

item.title: Pope Francis and Donald Trump clashed for years over treatment of migrants
item.description: Pope Francis clashed with Donald Trump several times over the years, primarily on Trump's immigration policy and rhetoric toward migrants.

item.title: Pope Francis' funeral date set as Vatican shows him lying in coffin
item.description: The Vatican says Pope Francis' funeral will be held on April 26 at St. Peter's Basilica after the pontiff lies in state there for three days.

item.title: LIVE: ABC News Live
item.description: 24/7 coverage of breaking news and live events

item.title: As controversies pile up, Trump allies increasingly turn on one another
item.description: Members of President Donald Trump’s administration are increasingly feuding as they face an escalating series of controversies

item.title: Tesla earnings to show whether anti-Musk backlash damaged bottom line
item.description: Musk's role at the White House set off worldwide protests at Tesla dealerships. Did it affect the automaker's bottom line?

item.title: 4/21: America Decides
item.description: Global tributes pour in for Pope Francis; Presidents and lawakers honor Pope Francis' legacy

item.title: Pope Francis live updates: Pope’s funeral to be held Saturday
Drones pose increasing risk to airliners near major US airports
